articles.title: This Woman Got Tricked By The Bride Into Wearing White To Her Wedding, And People Are Rallying Around Her In Support
articles.description: "She told me it was a 'friendship test.'"
articles.content: "When someone is mad at you because they lied to you and you believed them, that person is [the asshole], regardless of what conventions exist in the broader culture about colors of dresses. Your fri… [+408 chars]

articles.author: Raven Ishak
articles.title: People Are Sharing What Happened When They Confronted A "Friend" Who Ghosted Them, And I Wasn't Expecting This Kind Of Drama
articles.description: "When my friend was out of town once, her husband asked me to go to the movies with him, which I did. She decided this meant that I was having an affair with her husband. UM, WHAT? I had never expressed any interest in him whatsoever."
articles.content: "It turned out that they've been fighting and were getting a divorce! They were only married for a few months. It was a shock and they were leaving me high and dry in a new apartment with higher rent… [+1586 chars]
